alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 3:12PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Colbert, northern Franklin and west central Lawrence Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 312 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Belgreen, or 13 miles east of Tishomingo State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville, Littleville, Leighton, Belgreen, Posey Loop, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Srygley Church, New Bethel, La Grange and Tharptown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
